title: My portfolio
intro: Here are some selected projects completed during training, freelance work, or for fun. Each reflects my attention to quality, adaptability to needs, and passion for structured development.

pepe.title: Pépé la boulange
pepe.description: Showcase website and artisan order interface
pepe.descriptionLong: Full stack site developed for a bakery in Tarn, with admin area, product management, and online ordering. Built with Laravel and Vue.js for autonomous client management.

plantes.title: Révisions2Plantes
plantes.descriptionLong: Application designed in Vue.js for market gardening students. Offers cards, flashcard mode, and quizzes with scoring. Designed to help memorize ornamental, weed, and unwanted plants.

simpsons.title: Simpsons Fight
simpsons.descriptionLong: Game inspired by the Simpsons universe: turn-based combat between a random team and the alien Kang. Built with Angular, dynamic animations, and simple RPG game logic.

puissance4.title: Connect 4
puissance4.descriptionLong: Developed in OOP JavaScript, this game features complete win detection logic, player customization, dynamic grid, and multi-round mode with score objectives.

shinefulness.title: Shinefulness®
shinefulness.descriptionLong: SPA application in Vue.js and Laravel API based on 'Le théorème du bien-être' (O. Soria). Generates PDF roadmaps, statistics, mailing, and accessible user experience. Long-term CDA project with clean architecture, design patterns, and secure authentication (Sanctum).
